eg.javatools

Class Compilation

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.javatools.Compilation

  • public class Compilation
extends java.lang.Object
    Compiles java files in a given working directory using the JavaCompiler API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Compilation(ConsolePanel consPnl) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compile(java.lang.String root, java.lang.String execDir, java.lang.String sourceDir, java.lang.String[] includedExt)
      Invokes the javac compiler
      java.lang.String getFirstErrSource()
      Gets a shortened error message which only includes the source file and the line number of the first compilation error from the entire list of errors.
      boolean isCompiled()
      Returns the boolean that indicates if the java files could be compiled successfully

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Compilation

        public Compilation(ConsolePanel consPnl)
        Parameters:
        consPnl - the reference to ConsolePanel in whose text area messages are displayed

    • Method Detail

      • isCompiled

        public boolean isCompiled()
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the java files could be compiled successfully
        Returns:
        the boolean value which true in the case of success

      • getFirstErrSource

        public java.lang.String getFirstErrSource()
        Gets a shortened error message which only includes the source file and the line number of the first compilation error from the entire list of errors.
        The entire list of errors messages is printed to this ConsolePanel.
        Returns:
        the message

      • compile

        public void compile(java.lang.String root,
                    java.lang.String execDir,
                    java.lang.String sourceDir,
                    java.lang.String[] includedExt)
        Invokes the javac compiler
        Parameters:
        root - the root directory of the project
        execDir - the name of the destination directory for the compiles class files
        sourceDir - the name of the directory that contains java files or packages
        includedExt - the array of extensions of files that are copied to the executables folder. May be null.
